definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: I gave him what little mony I had.
sentences.chinese: 我竭尽绵薄之力将仅有的钱都给了他。

sentences.english: I think it's important that everybody does their bit for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 我想每个人都要为环境贡献绵薄之力，这一点很重要。

sentences.english: Hope that the conclusions of the study for Du Note slightly crew market.
sentences.chinese: 希望得出的结论能为杜注的研究略尽绵薄。

sentences.english: It is Kylin TV's wish to contribute to the work of spreading traditional Chinese culture around the world.
sentences.chinese: 麒麟电视希望在弘扬中华文化上尽一些绵薄之力。

definition: as far as one's capabilities extend (idiom); to the best of one's ability/within one's powers
(of a gift) to be a small token of one's feelings
to do all one can/to give all one has
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
